name: Neon Ball (Foxy Dreams Studios)
description: IMPORTANT: There is no proper way to quit the game, the only way you can quit is through the start menu or the end screen. If you wish to quit press the windows key and right click on the program and press close window. This is a very basic test of my skills with Unity. Use the W, A, S, D keys to move around and collect the floating squares. Once you collect all 12 you will move on to the next level. There is only 3 levels before you quit. DISCLAIMER: I do not know how this game will look like on different resolutions so it may look weird.
